title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 203 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 12, 2015

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 203





	On Thursday, February 12, 2015, the President signed into law:

	 

	H.R. 203, the "Clay Hunt Suicide Prevention for American Veterans Act" or the "Clay Hunt SAV Act," which makes various changes to authorities related to veterans mental health care and suicide prevention.
